name: Ghoul Bash
description: !! 1Day Game // Ghoul Bash !! Endless score based mini game Controls Directional Keys - Movement (double tap for dash) Up - Jump Down - Crouch F - Fullscreen Space - Restart Gain additional points for  Dash , Jump and Crouch kills !!  Dodge enemies and make sure they collide with your sword Be careful though 3 hits and you're done !!
